comments.body:
If the message is a quote, we receive additionally the link as a suggestion:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27704687/123839946-2338cc00-d8e4-11eb-894b-a63f51795e86.png)
This is the same behavior of the old modal. I agree it's not pretty, but there could be anything on the message, we just take the raw text and clip it to a set character count.
